original_text: We know that we can trust God to do the things that he has promised. So we must continue to expect those things. We must tell other people that we trust God. We should not stop doing that. We know that we can trust God to do the things that he has promised. So we must continue to expect those things. We must tell other people that we trust God. We should not stop doing that.
korean_text: 또 약속하신 이는 미쁘시니 우리가 믿는 도리의 소망을 움직이지 말며 굳게 잡고

sentences.original_text: We know that we can trust God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 하나님을 신뢰할 수 있다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: to do the things that he has promised
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 약속하신 일들을 행하실 것이라는 것을

sentences.original_text: So we must continue to expect those things
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 그것들을 계속 기대해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: We should not stop doing that
